name: He SiYuan
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: I hope you are happy every day! Yeee!May Many many Happy be With You...
text2: It's also the 69th day we've known each other.
text3: it's fantastic to be with you every day.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Hope we can always be this so sweet!
